DataElement.preferredDefinition: the branch of medical science that deals with the study of structure, function, and diseases of the nervous system; for thorough searching also see NEUROSCIENCE, MENTAL DISORDER, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER DIAGNOSIS, MENTAL DISORDER DIAGNOSIS, NERVOUS SYSTEM DISORDER CHEMOTHERAPY, COMMUNICATION DISORDER, NEUROMUSCULAR DISORDER._Having to do with children._A common, severe type of vascular headache often associated with increased sympathetic activity, resulting in nausea, vomiting, and light sensitivity._Any physical or mental impairment that interferes with an individual's ability to perform desired activities._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
